name: Species Distribution Modelling (CSDM)
description: Base filters for the Collaborative Species Distribution Modelling program

categories.name: Exclude spatially suspect records
categories.label: spatially-valid
categories.description: Exclude records with spatially suspect (spatiallyValid) flag

qualityFilters.description: Include only records where Spatial validity is "true"

categories.name: Exclude records that are environmental outliers
categories.label: environmental-outliers

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records that are an outlier against any environmental layer
Include only records where Year is 1970 to 2099
